Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's not just an item; it's an investment that will significantly enhance your capabilities and productivity. Given its value to you, I believe it's worth every penny of the $12000. However, to facilitate a smoother transaction, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
